subject: Psychology
title: Defense Mechanisms
description: A quick win: understand Defense Mechanisms.

hook.text: A man who's angry at his boss comes home and yells at his dog. He doesn't know why. Freud did.

buildup.text: Freud proposed that the ego uses defense mechanisms to protect itself from anxiety caused by inner conflicts.

discovery.text: Anna Freud cataloged them: repression, denial, projection, displacement, sublimation, and rationalization.

twist.text: Some defense mechanisms are healthy. Sublimation channels aggression into sports. Humor transforms pain into laughter.

climax.text: Defense mechanisms are among Freud's most lasting contributions. Modern therapy still identifies and works with them.

punchline.text: The mind protects itself in ways you never notice.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of defense mechanisms according to Freud?
options: To protect the ego from anxiety caused by inner conflicts
To increase conscious awareness of feelings
